name: Trinetra AI Solutions
mission: Bridging ancient wisdom with modern AI technology to transform businesses ethically and efficiently.
vision: To be the global leader in AI solutions that honor both technological innovation and timeless human values.

story.title: Our Journey: From Ancient Wisdom to Modern AI
story.description: Trinetra AI Solutions was born from the vision of bridging timeless Vedic wisdom with cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Our founders recognized that true innovation comes not just from advanced algorithms, but from understanding the deeper patterns and principles that govern both human consciousness and digital intelligence.

timeline.title: Company Foundation
timeline.description: Trinetra AI Solutions was founded with the vision of ethical AI development

timeline.title: First AI Solutions
timeline.description: Developed our first suite of AI tools for business process optimization

timeline.title: Hospitality AI Platform
timeline.description: Launched comprehensive AI platform for hospitality management

timeline.title: Market Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded services to enterprise clients across multiple industries

philosophy.title: Ancient Wisdom Meets Modern Innovation
philosophy.description: We believe that the most powerful AI solutions emerge when we combine the precision of modern technology with the wisdom of ancient mathematical and philosophical traditions.

principles.title: Vedic Mathematics Integration
principles.description: Incorporating time-tested mathematical principles from ancient Indian texts into our algorithms

principles.title: Sacred Geometry Patterns
principles.description: Using geometric patterns found in nature to optimize AI model architectures

principles.title: Ethical AI Development
principles.description: Building AI systems that prioritize human welfare and ethical considerations

principles.title: Holistic Problem Solving
principles.description: Approaching challenges with a comprehensive understanding of business, technology, and human factors
